name: B.A.L.D.
description:
B.A.L.D. is a short game made by students for the Projeto de Jogos (Games Project) class in UFRJ. It follows the classic model of horizontal scrolling shooters while adding its own twists, and is intended to be played solely with a mouse.

CONTROLS:

  • Left Mouse Button: Shoot projectiles (can be held).
  • Right Mouse Button: Split into smaller cells (stop shooting to merge back).

AUDIO:

All audio used is free and was taken from OpenGameArt.org. The credits for each are given below:

  • Theme song https://opengameart.org/content/battle-midi
  • Damage https://opengameart.org/content/punch
  • Heal https://opengameart.org/content/3-heal-spells
  • Menu click https://opengameart.org/content/multiple-click-sounds-effects
